mapper.select: select pr_no , pr_title , pr_content , to_char(p.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "create_date" , p.stack_name , p.mem_id , git_nick from my_pr p join member m on(p.mem_id = m.mem_id) where pr_no = #{bno} and p.status='Y'
select profile from member where mem_id=#{memId}
mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_no , mem_id , rep_content , ref_pro , rep_date ) values ( seq_reno.nextval , #{memId} , #{repContent} , #{refPrNo} , sysdate )
mapper.select: select reply_no , git_nick , r.mem_id , rep_content , ref_pro , to_char(rep_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "rep_date" , r.status from reply r join member m on (r.mem_id = m.mem_id) where r.status='Y' and ref_pro = #{bno} order by reply_no desc
